techmeme.title: Affirm reports Q4 revenue up 48% YoY to $659.2M, vs. $604M est., and says it expects to generate an operating profit by Q4 2025; AFRM jumps 14%+ after hours (Ciara Linnane/MarketWatch)
CrowdStrike reports Q2 revenue up 32% YoY to $963.9M, vs. $958.6M est., and cuts its FY 2025 revenue and profit forecasts, after last month's Windows outage (Jaspreet Singh/Reuters)
HP reports Q3 revenue up 2.4% YoY to $13.5B, vs. $13.4B est., Printing revenue down 3% to $4.14B, and increases its share repurchase authorization to $10B (Brody Ford/Bloomberg)
Nvidia reports Q2 revenue up 122% YoY to $30B, vs. $28.7B est., forecasts Q3 revenue above est., and says it approved an additional $50B in share buybacks (Kif Leswing/CNBC)
Salesforce reports Q2 revenue up 8% YoY to $9.33B, vs. $9.23B est., net income of $1.43B, compared to $1.27B a year ago, and says CFO Amy Weaver will step down (Larry Dignan/Constellation Research)
